ObjectProperty.Name: PersonEmploymentAssociation
ObjectProperty.DefinitionText: An association between a person and employment information.

Class.Name: PersonEmploymentAssociationType
Class.DefinitionText: A data type for an association between a person and an employment.

ObjectProperty.Name: Employer
ObjectProperty.DefinitionText: A party/entity (organization or person) who employs a person.

ObjectProperty.Name: Employee
ObjectProperty.DefinitionText: A person who works for a business or a person.
